name: Hazardous Holiday
overview: A freeware text adventure game by Phil Richmond written using the Creative Adventure Toolkit in 1995. In this game you take on the role of Archibald Blake, retired bank clerk, fitness fanatic and lepidopterist. Blake is on a short vacation in the picturesque village of Butterknowle, located in the high mountains between England and Wales, and is set for a STRANGE adventure. Note: Cannister must be spelt with two N's.
